shinymui 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Rating Input

Source: R/mui_rating.R
mui_ratingInput.Rd

UI Shiny Input for Rating

mui_ratingInput(
  inputId,
  value = NULL,
  size = "small",
  max = 5,
  disabled = FALSE,
  highlightSelectedOnly = FALSE,
  precision = 1,
  readOnly = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

inputId

Input id

value

Default value

size

Size of icons c("small", "medium", "large")

max

Maximum rating

disabled

If true, the component is disabled

highlightSelectedOnly

If true, only the selected icon will be highlighted

precision

The minimum increment value change allowed

readOnly

Removes all hover effects and pointer events

...

Other arguments/props

See also

Additional arguments/props

Examples


mui_ratingInput("rating_1", size = "medium", max = 5, precision = 0.5)
#> <span id="rating_1" class="mui_rating"></span>
#> <script id="rating_1_value" type="application/json">null</script>
#> <script id="rating_1_configuration" type="application/json">{"size":"medium","max":5,"disabled":false,"highlightSelectedOnly":false,"precision":0.5,"readOnly":false}</script>
